scene.name: Doing homework setup with multiple tools
scene.description: A desk with paper, a ruler, an eraser, and a pen arranged for a student

task.name: Perform homework tasks
task.description: Use the pen, ruler, and eraser to perform writing and drawing tasks on the paper
task.spoken_prompt: Task: Please start your homework. Use the pen to write, the ruler to draw a line, and the eraser to correct any mistakes.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：请开始写作业。用笔写字，用尺子画线，并用橡皮擦掉错误。

subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Start using your stationery for homework.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：开始使用文具写作业。

steps.description: Start doing homework using the pen, ruler, and eraser
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: start doing your homework.

constraints.notes: Ensure all tools are used sequentially as needed for a realistic homework simulation.
